description: Detect and list form fields in any PDF. Fill forms with your data and receive the completed PDF in seconds. Get a secure download link for easy sharing.

tools.name: detect_form_fields
tools.description: Detect and list all form fields in a PDF file. Accepts file path or URL.

pdf_source.description: Absolute path to the PDF file OR a URL to a publicly accessible PDF

tools.name: fill_form_fields
tools.description: Fill form fields in a PDF and upload to S3. Returns a pre-signed URL to download the filled PDF.

field_data.description: JSON string mapping field names to values. Format: {"field_name": "value", ...}. For checkboxes, use true/false or "yes"/"no".

pdf_source.description: Absolute path to the input PDF file OR a URL to a publicly accessible PDF
